description: RATS(n): Reverse Add Then Sort the digits.
references: R. K. Guy, Conway's RATS and other reversals, Amer. Math. Monthly, 96 (1989), 425-428.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, RATS Sequence
formula: Form m by Reversing the digits of n, Add m to n Then Sort the digits of the sum into increasing order to get a(n).a(n) = A004185(A056964(n)). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 14 2012]
maple: read transforms; RATS := n -> digsort(n + digrev(n));
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 19, 2002
